## Lipsum

This extension produces placeholder text that is useful for generating sample documents. An example appears below.

## Number of Paragraphs

{{< lipsum 2 >}}

{{< lipsum 5 zh >}}

## First 4 Paragraphs of Lipsum

{{< lipsum 4 jp >}}
